item.title: 美国称贝森特和加藤未在七国集团会议上讨论外汇水平问题
item.description: 美国财政部发表声明称，美国国务卿斯科特-贝森特和日本财务大臣加藤胜信在加拿大会晤期间没有讨论外汇水平问题。这一消息导致日元走低。【原文：US Secretary Scott Bessent and Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato did not discuss foreign exchange levels during a meeting in Canada, according to a statement from the Treasury Department. The news sent the yen lower.】

item.title: 美国赤字问题引发亚洲股市大跌：市场综述
item.description: 周四，美国股市、政府债券和美元因担心华盛顿不断膨胀的财政赤字而走软，亚洲股市随之下跌。【原文：Asian equities were primed to fall Thursday after US stocks, government bonds and the dollar weakened on concerns about Washington’s ballooning deficit.】

item.title: 谷歌谢尔盖-布林赠送价值 7 亿美元的股票作为礼物
item.description: 谷歌联合创始人谢尔盖-布林（Sergey Brin）个人财产超过 1,400 亿美元，他赠送了近 7 亿美元的 Alphabet 公司股票作为礼物。【原文：Google co-founder Sergey Brin, tapping a personal fortune that exceeds $140 billion, gave nearly $700 million in Alphabet Inc. shares away as a gift.】

item.title: 纽约大学的债券评级前景因巨额资本计划而受到影响
item.description: S&P全球评级公司将纽约大学的信用评级展望从稳定调整为负面，理由是该校计划增加用于资本项目的债务。【原文：The outlook on New York University’s credit rating was revised to negative from stable by S&P Global Ratings, which cited the school’s plans to ramp up debt for capital projects.】

item.title: 边缘白人非洲裔看游说特朗普如何获得回报
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普声称南非正在迫害白人农民，而这一未经证实的说法正是由这个边缘组织播下的种子，该组织多年来游说美国政客的努力终于得到了回报。【原文：The fringe group that planted the seed for some of Donald Trump’s unsubstantiated claims that South Africa is persecuting White farmers saw years of lobbying US politicians pay off.】

item.description: 在激进投资者赢得必能宝公司（Pitney Bowes Inc.【原文：The head of Hestia Capital Management is poised to become chief executive officer of Pitney Bowes Inc., about two years after the activist investor won board seats at the shipping services provider.】

item.title: Zoom 公布企业客户增长带来稳健收入
item.description: Zoom Communications Inc. 公布的来自企业客户的收入超过了分析师的预期，这表明其扩大后的产品套件销售强劲。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. reported revenue from enterprise customers that topped analysts’ estimates, suggesting stronger sales among its expanded suite of products.】

item.title: Hinge Health、MNTN IPO 测试美国上市反弹力度
item.description: 数字医疗和广告技术行业在首次公开募股（IPO）方面都有过令人失望的经历，这使得本周计划首次公开募股的理疗平台 Hinge Health Inc.和电视广告软件公司 MNTN Inc.【原文：The digital-health and advertising-technology sectors share a rich history of IPO disappointment, making this week’s planned debuts of physical therapy platform Hinge Health Inc. and TV ad software firm MNTN Inc. a test of whether the nascent recovery in the US first-time share sale market can keep going.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 首席执行官在任职 25 年后卸任主席一职
item.description: MercadoLibre 首席执行官马科斯-加尔佩林（Marcos Galperin）将成为这家电子商务和金融技术巨头的执行董事长，这标志着自他二十多年前创立这家拉丁美洲最有价值的公司以来，其最高职位首次发生变动。【原文：MercadoLibre Chief Executive Officer Marcos Galperin will become executive chairman of the e-commerce and financial technology giant, marking the first change in the top job since he founded Latin America’s most valuable company more than two decades ago.】

item.title: 加拿大最大养老金计划悄然放弃净零目标
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）在制定到 2050 年实现净零排放的目标仅三年后，就放弃了这一承诺。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board dropped its commitment to achieve net zero emissions by 2050 just three years after establishing the target.】

item.title: AT&T 以 57.5 亿美元收购 Lumen 的消费光纤业务
item.description: AT&T 公司同意以 57.5 亿美元的价格收购 Lumen Technologies 公司的消费光纤业务，从而扩大其在丹佛和拉斯维加斯等大城市的快速宽带服务。【原文：AT&T Inc. agreed to buy the consumer fiber operations of Lumen Technologies Inc. for $5.75 billion, expanding its fast broadband service in major cities like Denver and Las Vegas.】

item.title: 阿根廷 3 月份经济增长低于预期
item.description: 阿根廷 3 月份的经济增长低于预期，因为该国正准备与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）实施一项新计划。【原文：Argentina’s economy grew less than expected in March as the country braced for a new program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚命令天然气分销商降价并向客户退款
item.description: 哥伦比亚公用事业监管机构下令该国最大的天然气分销商万蒂集团（Grupo Vanti）降价，并补偿年初因收费上涨而受到影响的家庭。【原文：Colombia’s utilities watchdog ordered Grupo Vanti, the nation’s biggest natural gas distributor, to cut prices and reimburse households hit by higher charges at the start of the year.】

item.title: 巴西 Invepar 公司聘请债务重组顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西运输运营和服务公司 Invepar 聘请了投资银行精品公司 BR Advisory Partners Participacoes SA 担任债务重组顾问。【原文：Brazilian transport operations and services company Invepar hired investment-banking boutique BR Advisory Partners Participacoes SA as a debt-restructuring adviser, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: HPS 为 Consumer Cellular 主导超过 30 亿美元的私人债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 HPS Investment Partners 为首的一批私人信贷公司向 Consumer Cellular 公司提供了 30 多亿美元的债务，用于为其广泛的银团贷款再融资，并向其私人股本所有者 GTCR 支付股息。【原文：A group of private credit firms led by HPS Investment Partners provided more than $3 billion of debt to Consumer Cellular Inc. to refinance its broadly syndicated loans and pay a dividend to its private equity owner GTCR, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: CoreWeave 大涨超过分析师目标，花旗将其目标翻倍
item.description: CoreWeave 公司的涨势如此迅猛，让分析师们的股票预测落了空。周三上午，花旗研究公司（Citi Research）将该股 12 个月的目标价提高了一倍多，达到了华尔街的最高点。开盘后，股价在头 15 分钟的交易中就超过了这一目标。【原文：CoreWeave Inc.’s rally is running so hot it’s leaving analysts’ stock predictions in the dust. Citi Research more than doubled their 12-month price target on the stock to a Wall Street high Wednesday morning. When the market opened shares blew past it in the first 15 minutes of trading.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦称欧元意外走强影响通胀
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，欧元和能源价格一直在拖累消费价格增长，而美国关税的影响则更难以评估。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva said the euro and energy prices have been weighing on consumer-price growth, while the fallout from US tariffs is more complicated to evaluate.】

item.title: 信用评分股因 FHFA 负责人质疑定价而下滑
item.description: 在联邦住房金融局负责人对信用报告定价提出质疑后，Fair Isaac 公司的股价将创下 2020 年 3 月以来最差的一天，与信用局股票一起下跌。【原文：Fair Isaac Corp.’s shares are on track for their worst day since March 2020, falling alongside credit bureau stocks after the head of the Federal Housing Finance Agency questioned credit report pricing.】

item.title: Azul 债务谈判加速通过破产保护进行融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西航空公司 Azul SA 正在与债权人就一笔约 6 亿美元的融资进行深入谈判，这笔融资将为该公司提供资金，以渡过可能最快于下周破产的难关。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul SA is in advanced talks with creditors for a roughly $600 million financing that would fund the company through a potential bankruptcy that could come as soon as next week, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 主要银行家离职后，道明银行加拿大债券排名下滑
item.description: 短短几个月内，多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）在加拿大债券承销商中的排名因固定收益专业人士的出走而跌至同业垫底。【原文：In just a few months, Toronto-Dominion Bank’s ranking among Canadian bond underwriters has dropped to close to the bottom among its peers, after an exodus of fixed-income professionals.】

item.title: 微软在与 Snowflake 和 Databricks 的竞争中吹嘘销售额
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）表示，在与Snowflake Inc.和Databricks Inc.等竞争对手的竞争中，该公司以数据为重点的产品Fabric正在迅速赢得客户。【原文：Microsoft Corp. said its data-focused product, Fabric, is rapidly picking up customers in competition with rivals including Snowflake Inc. and Databricks Inc.】

item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔称美国贸易谈判不受中国关系影响
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）说，美国承诺将 "同情地 "审查马来西亚要求降低关税的呼吁，尽管这个东南亚国家正寻求加强与华盛顿的头号竞争对手中国的关系。【原文：Malaysia’s Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said the US pledged to “sympathetically” review its appeal for lower tariffs even as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to strengthen its ties with Washington’s top competitor China.】

item.title: 米莱补贴削减后，阿根廷富人面临更高的能源账单
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统将削减对大布宜诺斯艾利斯地区所有豪宅社区的能源补贴，此举将打击阿根廷上层社会中的一部分人，他们多年来一直只需支付一小部分燃气和电费。【原文：President Javier Milei will cut energy subsidies for all gated communities in the greater Buenos Aires region, a move that will hit a portion of Argentina’s upper class that for years has been paying a fraction of their gas and electric bills.】

item.title: 夏洛特斥资 3.07 亿美元改造蓬勃发展的机场
item.description: 北卡罗来纳州夏洛特市随着新居民的增加、航空交通量的上升和经济的膨胀而蓬勃发展。现在，该市正求助于市政债券市场，以确保其机场能够跟上发展步伐。【原文：Charlotte, North Carolina, is booming with new residents, rising air traffic and a swelling economy. Now, the city is turning to the municipal bond market to make sure its airport can keep up.】
